txt.en: 'You have done all that is needed for our little camp, [placeholder], and we appreciate your help! But I expect you are excited to delve further into Moria, as we are.\n\n'The Dolven-view camp is the central camp of the dwarves in the Great Delving. I expect that several dwarves will have settled there, and established many useful town services.'

'Greetings, my good [placeholder], and welcome to the Dolven-view! 'Tis a fine view indeed -- or at least it would be were it not cluttered with the cook-fires of a goblin horde beneath us....\n\n'No matter. We will defend the Dolven-view at all costs, and find some way to drive these vermin from our ancestral homes. Mark my words [placeholder], this will once again be a city of wonder and beautiful to behold, though we give our lives to achieve it!'
'Are you not excited to press further into Moria? We certainly are.'
Thórhall has encouraged you to head east to the Dolven-view camp, the central hub of the dwarves in the Great Delving.

'Greetings, my good [placeholder] and welcome to the Dolven-view! 'Tis a fine view indeed - or at least it would be were it not cluttered with the cook-fires of a goblin horde beneath us...\n\n'That's where we come in. We must defend the Dolven-view at all costs, and find some way to drive these vermin from our ancestral homes. Mark my words [placeholder], this will once again be a city of wonder and beautiful to behold, though we give our lives to achieve it!'
Talk to Slagvi at the Dolven-view
The Dolven-view camp lies east of Lamab-dûm, at a somewhat central cross-roads in the Great Delving.\n\nYou should follow the lit road as best you can to the Dolven-view.
